settings.title: Silent/Portable

settings.heading: Why Smart Nora?
settings.paragraph:
Smart Nora is the world's most comfortable snoring solution and has improved the lives of tens and thousands of couples around the world. Be part of the reason why couples are getting better sleep.

With Nora you can turn any pillow into an anti-snore pillow and sleep on your side, back or stomach. Go to bed as you normally would, Nora takes care of the rest.

settings.heading: It creates a gentle motion in the pillow to stop snoring without waking you up.
settings.point_1_text: Snore sounds are caused by air passing through a partially collapsed airway. Nora monitors breathing patterns withproprietary machine learning algorithms.
settings.point_2_heading: 2. Creates a very slow motion under the pillow.
settings.point_2_text: The inflatable piece inside the pillow insert gently raises the head of the user. Just enough to prompt the muscles to support the airway as they normally should.
settings.point_3_text: The slow motion prompts the throat muscles to support theairway. Airway resumes its normal open position. As obstruction ofthe airway is reduced, air can flow freely and snoring stops.
settings.right_section_text: Completely contact-free: No nose strips, chin straps, or mouth guards.

settings.testimonial_content: "I have recommended the use of Nora in several of my patients who snore heavily and in less than two weeks, all of them have found it to improve their sleep, increase alertness in the morning and improve their energy levels during the day. The device is quiet, discreet, portable and it has made an impressive difference in my patients' lives."

For the first time somebody clearly showed a product could have a positive effect on both the snorer and their partner, improving both sleep qualities. What was striking and we never saw such good numbers before, is that people really loved the product.
settings.author_designation: VP Sleep Science SleepScore Labs.  Prev : Apple, Philips

settings.testimonial_content: "Nora does the work for you. You don't have to wake up to adjust your pillow at night Nora inflates or deflates it, while you continue to rest comfortably. You don't have to do anything."

Sleep is not negotiable. It's essential.
Kudos to 140,000 of you Nora users for taking a step to do something about your snoring, both for you, your waking hours too, and for your bed partner.

settings.title: Scientifically validated.
settings.description: Research conducted by SleepScore Labs, shows effectiveness of using Smart Nora based on 500+ nights of collected data.
